mapper.select: SELECT co.*, a.admin_name AS adminName, c.class_name AS className, b.building_name AS buildingName FROM complete_order AS co LEFT JOIN class AS c ON c.class_id = co.class_id LEFT JOIN building AS b ON b.building_id = co.building_id LEFT JOIN administrator AS a ON a.admin_id = co.admin_id ORDER BY co.complete_time DESC

SELECT co.*,a.admin_name AS adminName, c.class_name AS className, b.building_name AS buildingName FROM complete_order AS co LEFT JOIN class AS c ON c.class_id = co.class_id LEFT JOIN building AS b ON b.building_id = co.building_id LEFT JOIN administrator AS a ON a.admin_id = co.admin_id WHERE co.order_id = #{id}

SELECT co.*,a.admin_name AS adminName, c.class_name AS className, b.building_name AS buildingName FROM complete_order AS co LEFT JOIN class AS c ON c.class_id = co.class_id LEFT JOIN building AS b ON b.building_id = co.building_id LEFT JOIN administrator AS a ON a.admin_id = co.admin_id WHERE co.problem LIKE "%"#{keyWord}"%" ORDER BY co.complete_time DESC
